scripts.dev: bash -c " npm run build && live-server --port=8848 --browser=C:/Users/non/AppData/Local/Chromium/Application/chrome.exe ./dist/ & gulp watch "
scripts.release: npm run build && rm -rf ../../demos/uoowuo.github.io/cellulata/* && cp -a ./dist/* ../../demos/uoowuo.github.io/cellulata/ && echo release copied
